input_data.bullet_points:
JBL Deep Bass Sound: Get the most from your mixes with high-quality audio from secure, reliable earbuds with 8mm drivers featuring JBL Deep Bass Sound
Comfortable fit: The ergonomic, stick-closed design of the JBL Vibe Beam fits so comfortably you may forget you're wearing them. The closed design excludes external sounds, enhancing the bass performance
Up to 32 (8h + 24h) hours of battery life and speed charging: With 8 hours of battery life in the earbuds and 24 in the case, the JBL Vibe Beam provide all-day audio. When you need more power, you can speed charge an extra two hours in just 10 minutes.
Hands-free calls with VoiceAware: When you're making hands-free stereo calls on the go, VoiceAware lets you balance how much of your own voice you hear while talking with others
Water and dust resistant: From the beach to the bike trail, the IP54-certified earbuds and IPX2 charging case are water and dust resistant for all-day experiences
input_data.description: "Bring your sound everywhere. With bass you can feel, up to 32 total hours of battery life, and a secure, comfortable stick-closed design, the splash and dust resistant JBL Vibe Beam are designed for your daily entertainment.

product_attributes.included_components: 1 x JBL Vibe Beam earbuds, 1 x Charging case, 1 x Type-C to Type-A charging cable, 1 x 3 sizes of eartips, 1 x Warranty / Warning, 1 x Quick Start Guide / Safety Sheet

input_data.title: JBL Vibe Beam - True Wireless JBL Deep Bass Sound Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.2, Water & Dust Resistant, Hands-free call with VoiceAware, Up to 32 hours of battery life (White)

output_data.reasoning: Analyzing JBL Vibe Beam Earbuds for 'Listening to audio'. 1. Bluetooth 5.2: If removed entirely, the earbuds would still have Bluetooth capability (e.g., Bluetooth 4.0) - NOT hard constraint. 2. Deep Bass Sound: If removed, the earbuds would still produce sound, just not with enhanced bass - QUALITY, NOT hard constraint. 3. Up to 32 Hours Battery Life: If removed, the earbuds would still function with a shorter battery life (e.g., 8 hours) - PERFORMANCE SPEC, NOT hard constraint. 4. Water and Dust Resistant: If removed, the earbuds would still function and produce sound, just not be protected from water and dust - DURABILITY feature, NOT hard constraint. 5. Hands-Free Call with VoiceAware: If removed, the earbuds would still allow for hands-free calls, just without the VoiceAware feature - CONVENIENCE feature, NOT hard constraint. Conclusion: 0 hard constraints.

input_data.bullet_points:
24-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock
Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening
Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock
Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice; cup holder-friendly base
BPA, lead, and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids
input_data.description: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, a cup holder-friendly base, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
input_data.title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, BPA-Free Sports Water Bottle, Great for Travel, 24 Oz, Denim

output_data.reasoning: Analyzing Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle for 'Carrying drinks for hydration'. Stainless Steel: Remove entirely? NO - plastic can hold liquid too. MATERIAL choice. NOT hard. 24oz Size: Remove entirely? NO - any size can hold liquid. QUALITY (capacity). NOT hard. Insulated: Remove entirely? NO - non-insulated can still hold liquid. FEATURE (temperature). NOT hard. BPA-Free: Remove entirely? NO - still holds liquid. SAFETY feature. NOT hard. Conclusion: 0 hard constraints.

360° Customizable Viewing Angle: Achieve full viewing flexibility with triple-axis adjustment—360° swivel, 180° tilt, and foldable arm positioning. Effortlessly switch between portrait and landscape modes. Built-in zinc alloy hinges rated for 7,000+ adjustments

Wide Device Compatibility & Instant Setup: Supports iPhone 12–17 and other smartphones with the included magnetic ring. Mounts firmly to dashboards, mirrors, windows, or smooth tile—ideal for your car, home, or studio.
